attributes.action: Western Troops Protecting Christians and Minorities against IS
attributes.additional_details: I call on the ministry to allot troops to help the Kurds fight the animals that are IS. It is in Western Interest to stand up against war crimes committed by these animals in the name of religion. Britain went into Iraq a decade ago based on false pretences but now we have a situation that is far more deadly and far more serious than the 2003 war. IS are the new Nazi's and we need to stand up against them and there cause and while we are at it, pressurise Saudi Arabia and Qatar to stop privately funding IS.
